Credit Line: The Elisha Whittelsey Collection, The Elisha Whittelsey Fund, 1964
Description: Vertical Panel with Repeating Pattern with Blue and Gold Designs and Decorative Butterfly Wings at Right, from a group of 158 textile designs from an unidentified French designer. The designs include brightly colored patterns and single motifs in late Art Nouveau and Art Deco styles. Most designs have been made on tracing paper and show signs of transfer. Some include instructions for execution, written in French.
